channel.title: Does making an account on your own ip then playing on proxy put you at risk?
channel.description: does making an account on your own ip then playing on proxy put you at risk? i make accounts in firefox with no proxy, then i only use then ona proxy with aryan. if this is not safe how else can i make accounts?

item.title: Does making an account on your own ip then playing on proxy put you at risk?

item.description:
@t0tum wrote:

I think jag024 is right. I did the same in the beginning and still have my main and noob main.

Read full topic
